title: What happened to CLASH?
body: I was just wondering what happened to CLASH like the first day it got cancelled and now its like GONE!!! so i'm like what the hell happened to it?

replies.body: Hi ToshiroT1. We ran tests in regions all over the world and they didn't go as well as we'd hoped. Since then, the Clash dev team has been planning what’s next for the mode, and that planning wrapped up recently. So we should have an update on the future of Clash in a little while.
Thank you for the info cause i LOVE the feeling of being a team working together like a LCS player when CLASH came out i was so excited and i'm pretty keen on it to come back :)

Can I just ask, is there any compensation planned (or discussion about potential compensation) for the players who were adversely affected by the "Crash of Clash™", or is there info on that to come with the update on the status of Clash?
they did more testing a couple weeks ago and some games still failed to launch. So its broken and they haven't (can't) fixed it.
